title: Rongza hwbai nwng angni gwswkhou
lyrics:
Rongza hwbai nwng angni gwswkhou
Thwinaikhou derhananwi
Swrang hwbai nwng angni be jiukhou
Gwdan mohor lananwi -2
(A)
Hayakhwswi thwinaya dinwi]
Nwngkhou lakhinw gwthwi mohorwi -2
Gwthwi mohora lajinangbai dinwi
Nwngni sigangao -2
(B)
Lama nwngw subung harini
Jiu nwngw subung harini -2
Jwbnw gwiywi jiu, jwbnw gwiwi onnai
Nwngnao lonw
